Text:
Three copies of the first album = bloat.  This is only three albums.

Self Titled - Transplants 2@192 1@320(proper)
Haunted Cities 1@320(proper)
Haunted Cities (Chopped & Screwed) 1@128(WTF!)

Get this from other sources or just get the first two from this torrent.

Thanks dude! Only complaint is the same thing MrE159357 said, theres several copies of the albums and some aren't as good quality as the others. I just checked the file sizes and downloaded the ones with the biggest file size.
